directions: In a heavy kettle combine all ingredients. Cook mixture over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, 30 minutes. Reduce heat to low and simmer mixture, stirring occasionally, 30 minutes more, or until thickened and reduced to about 2 1/2 cups. Chutney keeps chilled, covered, 3 months.
ingredients: a 28- to 32-ounce can whole tomatoes with juice, chopped
zest of 1 lemon, removed with vegetable peeler and minced
title: Tomato Chutney
